# Illusion Purge (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[Truth (Domain)|Truth 7]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 15]], [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 5 ft./level

**Area:** 5-ft.-radius/level emanation, centered on you

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of Eberron (WotC), pg. 187

You surround yourself with a powerful sphere of magical clarity that negates all illusions of 7th level or lower. Anything concealed or altered by illusion appears in its natural state while in the area.
